## JsPlumbInstance.reset() method

Clears all endpoints and connections from the instance of jsplumb. Does not also clear out event listeners, selectors, or connection/endpoint types - for that, use `destroy()`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
reset(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
